summary: Microsoft PowerPoint is a popular software for creating presentations. It was first made by a company called Forethought and later bought by Microsoft in 1987. Initially for Macintosh, it later came to Windows. PowerPoint became a part of Microsoft Office, which made it very successful. It's now used in many places, not just businesses. The software has grown a lot since it started, adding new features and working on different devices.
title: Microsoft PowerPoint
